articles.title: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson switches to Republican Party - The Texas Tribune
articles.description: Though the mayor’s position in Dallas is technically nonpartisan, Johnson joins Fort Worth Mayor Mattie Parker as one of two Republican mayors to lead a major Texas city.
articles.content:
